reviews.text: Have been here on a few occasions. The experience is always fantastic, the food is always cooked to perfection. The staff are brilliant, very helpful and attentive. My family always thoroughly enjoys it. I'd recommend it to anyone as a superb place to eat.
reviews.title: Fantastic as always

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I have just returned from a wonderful week-end at the Carrick Lodge in Ayr. We have eaten in the restaurant on previous occasions but had never stayed overnight.
reviews.title: Wonderful Week-end.

reviews.text: We were not disappointed,!!! The room was excellent, dinner was wonderful and Sundays breakfast was magical.
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.text: Added to that the staff were, as always, terrific, being welcoming, helpful and attentive in equal measure.
reviews.title: Good rooms, great food and outstanding customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a really excellent experience and we will return !! (PS, We will also sing it's praises to all and sundry!!).
reviews.title: Night out

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from Ayr and booked a night overstay in the Carrick Lodge hotel. The hotel was lovely room bright and clean my only negative was the size of the bathroom and the pressure of the shower. We decided to try the restaurant and had a delightful meal. I would recommend this hotel to any visiting Ayr.
reviews.title: Great Find

reviews.text: My partner and I dined here based upon a recommendation. It was superb. The staff were very friendly and efficient. The food was perfectly presented and tasted delicious. Value wise, my partner had the steak burger which was enormous, bolstered by three jumbo onion rings. I opted for the chicken and black pudding in peppercorn sauce which came with vegetables and a serving of paprika coated fries. The whole bill including 2 starters, 2 mains and drinks came in at £36 which is amazing value in light of the quality and service. Excellent. Do not miss this place if in Ayr.
reviews.title: Tremendous in every respect

reviews.text: We ate here as a small family group and were made to feel most welcome. The staff are very nice people, the food was good and the hospitality is second to none in Ayr. I would dine here again.
reviews.title: Good food, nice place

reviews.text: I have dined at this Hote's Restaurant many times, the latest being April 2012 and can honestly say that I have never been disappointed with the food quality and prices. The only drawback is not being able to finish the main course because of quantity! The steak salad is really outstanding with the steak being 'melt in the mouth'.
reviews.title: First Class Restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Negatives first. WiFi is only available in the public rooms. The shower cubicle was very small (and no bath in our room). No sepcific bar / lounge area. However staff were more than happy to clear a dining space for us to sit and have a pre dinner drink. That's it.
reviews.title: Small and Friendly Hotel

reviews.text: Choice of meals were very good and surroundings are all to a high standard the seating for the restaurants are scattered around the various rooms, but careful thought has been put into each room and each table, securing privacy and good use of space. Staff were very attentive and our table were given a complimentary drink as we were celebrating a special occassion.
reviews.title: excellent Meal and surroundings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This restaurant was recommended by Paul and Rhona (Ayrs and Graces B&B) - a 10% discount can be achieved by staying at A&G then visiting Carrick Lodge.
reviews.title: I very rarely issue 5* reviews - this visit was worth this rating
Excellent
reviews.text: We were not let down based on the visit we had, the food was excellent in all aspects.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff we encountered were very friendly and professional.
reviews.title: Well cooked food pleasantly presented

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The culinary highlight was the "banoffee pie" - in all the restaurants I have ever visited this could be the best dessert I have ever had, the presentation was sublime.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: I stayed here for business during a miserable week of gales and rain in late November 2011. I found the room to be spacious, cosy and very clean with all the little touches that made it feel like home. The staff here are amazing! There are many different team members but each one seems so happy to be working there and nothing is too much trouble. As a business traveller it's sometimes very lonely in those faceless chains I get put in but this hotel made my week, three nights of comfort, excellent food, great hospitality and service which was second to none! I'd love to go back and stay for pleasure, I hope you enjoy it as much as I did!
reviews.title: Warm and friendly with excellent food.

reviews.text: Myself, my husband, mum, dad and brother visited the Carrick Lodge for a birthday celebration. We have been here a number of times and always thoroughly enjoyed it.
reviews.title: Beautiful Food and Atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food is fantastic, along with the service. The menu offers a wide variety of options to suit all tastes, with all ingredients being fresh and tasty. The restaurant itself is lovely, we eat out in Ayrshire regularly and the Carrick Lodge is the nicest dining room, the decor and layout are extremely inviting and homely, with there being a number of smaller rooms it gives a much more intimate feel and makes conversation easier, a lovely relaxed atmosphere.
reviews.title: Firts class hotel and staff
Not the same as it used to be - Strange menu & Prices Increased!!!
reviews.text: The Carrick Lodge bears are lovely too, we now have one at home!

Stayed there after a day at the races. Staff incredibly motivated and friendly. Hotel itself ticked all the boxes for furnishings and facilities (bearing in mind it's a relatively small hotel) but for us the attitude and helpfulness of the staff really put a smile on our faces. Will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Faultless!
